interface.name: nitobi.grid.Cell
interface.summary: nitobi.grid.Cell represents a single data cell in a Grid.

interface.name: nitobi.grid.Column
interface.summary: nitobi.grid.Column represents a single column of data in a Grid.

property.name: GetHandler
property.summary: Specifies the URL of the CheckboxEditor's gethandler. The gethandler must return valid XML data in the EBA format.

property.name: DisplayFields
property.summary: Specifies what fields from the datasource specified by DatasourceId or by the GetHandler will populate the CheckboxEditor's listbox.
property.remarks: DisplayFields is a pipe-delimited list of data fields (eg. "field1|field2|field3").

property.name: ValueField
property.summary: Specifies the field of the CheckboxEditor's data source that will populate the cell.

method.name: selectRowByIndex
method.summary: Selects a grid cell by row index.

method.name: selectRowByKey
method.summary: Selects a grid cell by key.

method.name: selectCellByCoords
method.summary: Activates a grid cell. The activated cell is highlighted. Subsequent function calls such as deleteCurrentRow, insertAfterCurrentRow, getActiveColumnObject, getActiveRowObject depends on the new active cell. The row and colum index starts at 0.

method.name: save
method.summary: Saves data in the grid.

method.name: insertAfterCurrentRow
method.summary: Insert a new row after the row of the active cell.

method.name: deleteCurrentRow
method.summary: Deletes currently selected row.

method.name: insertRow
method.summary: Inserts a new row into the grid

method.name: getCellObject
method.summary: Returns the cell object of a grid.

method.name: getRowObject
method.summary: Returns a row object.

method.name: getRowCount
method.summary: Returns the number of rows in the grid.

method.name: getSelectedLookupKey
method.summary: Returns the selected lookup key

method.name: getSelectedColumnNumber
method.summary: Returns the column index of the selected cell.
method.param: Specifies whether to compensate for frozen columns.
method.returns: Column index of the selected cell.

method.name: getSelectedColumnObject
method.summary: Returns the nitobi.grid.Column object that the selected cell is part of.
method.returns: nitobi.grid.Column object of the selected cell.

method.name: getSelectedRow
method.summary: Returns the row index of the selected cell.
method.param: Specifies whether to compensate for frozen rows.
method.returns: Row index of the selected cell.

method.name: getSelectedRowObject
method.summary: Returns the nitobi.grid.Row object that the selected cell is part of.
method.returns: nitobi.grid.Row object of the selected cell.

method.name: getSelectedCellObject
method.summary: Returns a reference to the nitobi.grid.Cell object representing the currently selected cell in the Grid.

method.name: GridSelection
method.summary: The selection object is used during select operations by the user. Its members provide the functionality for displaying the selected(highlighted blocks
method.param: A reference to the grid containing the selection

method.name: selectionhighlight
method.summary: Highlights the selected area

method.name: deselect
method.summary: Acts as the opposite of highlight

method.name: containsSelection
method.summary: Returns true if the grid contains a valid selection

method.name: cellIsInSelection
method.summary: Returns true if the given Cell is situated inside the active grid selection and the selection is bigger than just one cell.

method.name: copy
method.summary: Copys the current selection into the clipboard. This method stores the data as text with a tab for every column. This is the same format MS Excel uses and therefore the paste method also works with data copied from a MSExcel spreadsheet.

method.name: paste
method.summary: Pasts data from the clipboard into the grid if it contains tabular data. Also pasts data from MSExcel as Excel places data to the clipboard in the form of tabular data as well.

method.name: getPendingSortColumn
method.summary: Retrieves the pending sort column number.
method.returns: Pending sort column number of the Grid.

method.name: loadNextDataPage
method.summary: Loads the next page of data from the database.
method.remarks: This method requests the data from a getHandler which is a server-side script designed to deliver the requested data.

method.name: loadPreviousDataPage
method.summary: Loads the previous page of data from the database.
method.remarks: This method requests the data from a getHandler which is a server-side script designed to deliver the requested data.

method.name: loadDataPage
method.summary: Loads the specified page of data from the database.
method.param: Recordnumber of record which should be display on top of the page.

method.name: makeXSL
method.summary: Makes the main XSL
method.remarks: The makeXSL() method is normally called automatically when the grid is first instantiated.
